Name: Dan Jackson
Strengths:
Plays with a decisive reactor for quick drive triggers
Forceful high to low tackler  runs the alley like a runaway train
Looks to lay licks on crossers and screens
Anticipates wide receiver breaks and gets a head start

Forced key fumble late against Georgia Tech in his nal game in Athens  which allowed Bulldogs to come back and win Nov  2024
Extensive special teams background and a regular on kicko and punt return coverage the past four seasons blocked field goal in 2024
Described as  phenomenal  teammate because of a positive attitude and work ethic that raises the bar Smart  All he does is give everything
he s got every single day  
Only missed start in 2024 was because of a targeting penalty the week before
Weaknesses:
Average frame and lacks ideal length
Tight hips and inconsistent sink create lags in redirects
Lackluster coverage speed  especially when defending the sidelines
Bites on initial route movements and can be fooled by ballhead fakes

Tackling technique leaves plenty to be desired  often hits instead of wrapping
Stress fracture in foot Oct  2022  which required season ending surgery also missed 2023 spring practices
Only one season playing starter snaps
Will turn 25 during his rookie season

Name: Craig Woodson
Strengths:
Controlled  fluid mover and stays on the same plan vertically in his turn and run
Has good feel for spacing in the deep third to inuence multiple routes
Good timing when attacking the catch point to dislodge ball from man
Arrives without going through receivers one coverage penalty over past three seasons
Accelerates through hips of ball carrier as tackler
Productive playing down at line of scrimmage
Stopwatch speed shows up most as a backside chaser
Plenty of special teams experience 450 career snaps
Started all 38 games the past three seasons NFL scouts say he is an A plus person
Weaknesses:
More smooth than dynamic in his movements
Trusts his eyes but can be manipulated for that very reason
Plays with good speed but not good enough to easily recover from a misstep
Needs to eliminate zigs and zags from pursuit angles
Required season ending surgery after injuring knee during 2021 fall camp
Will be 24 on draft weekend

Name: Rayuan Lane III

tape

  Misses in the run game usually came when he left his feet too early
